text: a financial services company seeking to
improve fraud detection to protect their
clients a hospital network building
better diagnostic tools to improve
patient care
a retailer looking to better manage
inventory by understanding the
purchasing habits of their customers
these challenges and many more require a
more sophisticated approach than
traditional analytics because their
scale and complexity make it too
difficult to develop a rules-based
solution Amazon Web Services delivers a
full suite of machine learning services
to solve virtually any problem
Amazon Sage Maker is a fully managed
platform that enables data scientists
and developers to quickly and easily
build train and deploy machine learning
models it removes all the barriers that
typically slow down developers so that
models can get to production in days or
weeks not months and training models is
up to 10 times faster than anywhere else
AWS also offers services that use pre
trained models so that you can add
intelligence to any application without
machine learning expertise these
services make it fast to implement image
and video analysis natural sounding
speech translation and transcription and
advanced text analytics you can also
quickly deploy voice and text driven
digital assistants to improve customer
service best of all because this
technology is built on AWS you're able
to take advantage of the security and
scale of the AWS cloud which is why more
machine learning is deployed on AWS than
anywhere else
machine learning on AWS takes the
complexity out of AI so you can build
innovative new solutions faster
you
